data.title: Facebook says more people are viewing live videos after the coronavirus outbreak
data.text: From February to March, the number of Facebook Live viewers in the US increased up to 50%.

data.title: Facebook Messenger Launches a Coronavirus Community Hub
data.text: The messaging platform provides a resource for staying connected as well as ways to fight misinformation.

data.title: Facebook Names Former Treasury Official as Lead Independent Director
data.text: Facebook appointed Robert Kimmitt, the former deputy Treasury Secretary for President George W. Bush as its lead independent director.

data.title: 10 Stocks To Buy With Low Debt And High Liquidity
data.text: Given the near-term economic uncertainty surrounding the COVID-19 outbreak, investors have been shifting their focus from growth stocks to stocks that have the balance sheets and liquidity to weather the current downturn.
